participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Jessica is creative and introspective. She has a passion for art and enjoys expressing herself through dance.
participant_1.background: i take dance lessons once a week. i love new kids on the block. i was born in the early 80 s. i also like old school hip hop. my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: George is adventurous and quirky. He has a unique lifestyle and enjoys the simplicity of nature through beekeeping.
participant_2.background: my name is george. i've zero family that i'm close to. my favorite food is papaya. i married a super model from italy. i am a bee farmer.

content.text: hey there , i do believe we never met . . how was your day ?
